title-group.article-title: Subsurface Combat In A Test Tube:
title-group.subtitle: Re-analyzing the Work of G.F. Gause

permissions.copyright-statement: © 2010, Military Operations Research Society and Military Application Society

ref.mixed-citation: Gause, G. F., The Struggle For Existence. The Russian original was published in 1934; an English translation came out in the same year, published by Williams and Wilkins (Baltimore). I cite the Dover paperback version, first printed in 1971. An on-line version is available at http://www.ggause.com/Contgau.htm.
Neuhauser, Claudia, “Mathematical Challenges in Spatial Ecology,” Notices of the American Mathematical Society, volume 48, number 11 (December 2001), pp 1304-14.
Mangel, Marc. The Theoretical Biologist’s Toolbox: Quantitative Methods for Ecology and Evolutionary Biology, Cambridge University Press, 2006.

Koopman, Bernard Osgood, Search and Screening. OEG Report 56. Washington, DC, Operations Evaluation Group [The Center for Naval Analyses], 1946. Reprinted with major revisions, Pergamon 1980 and Military Operations Research Society 1999.
Epstein, Joshua M. Nonlinear Dynamics, Mathematical Biology, and Social Science, Santa Fe Institute and Addison Wesley, 1997.
